DOC.brief_title: Active Symptom Control Alone Or In Combination With Oral Topotecan In Patients With Relapsed Resistant Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Received one prior chemotherapy regimen . Documented partial complete response firstline therapy . Documented relapse limited extensive SCLC least 45 day cessation firstline chemotherapy . Not consider suitable intravenous chemotherapy . Considered adequate bone marrow reserve . Performance Status 0 , 1 2 . Pregnant lactating . Received one prior regimen chemotherapy . Uncontrolled vomiting . Brain metastasis . Active uncontrolled infection . Received previous treatment HYCAMTIN . Received investigational product within 30 day .
